dict.acceptation: 像，像……一样；由于；同时，当……时；尽管；
阿斯（古罗马重量单位，约373克）；

sent.orig: The time isn't as important as the terrain; but the terrain isn't as important as unity with the people.
sent.trans: 天时不如地利，地利不如人和。

sent.orig: As the story goes, she left him as soon as she discovered that he had no money.
sent.trans: 据说她一发现他没有钱就离开了他。

sent.orig: Better work as hard as an ant than lead a parasitic life as a sparrow.
sent.trans: 宁做蚂蚁腿，不做麻雀嘴。

sent.orig: Do English as spoken in the UK and English as spoken in the USA differentiate more as the years pass?
sent.trans: 英式英语与美式英语的差异是否会随着时间推移而进一步加大？
